Ben Roethlisberger did his time.`` He did everything he was asked to do. He conducted himself as a real gentleman.`` I'm very proud of him. I think he's going to be( regarded as) a fine person to the world as time goes on. It has been a season of redemption for Ben Roethlisberger , who has not only won games but won back many of the fans, team mates and a city that had turned their backs on him.
